original_title: Five takeaways from a week of Trump’s Ukraine diplomacy — RT World News
article_summary: US President Donald Trump announces that Russian President Vladimir Putin is open to security guarantees for Ukraine, a key demand by Ukraine for a lasting peace. Trump is hosting Ukrainian leader Vladimir Zelensky and Ukraine's key European backers at the White House, following a Trump-Putin summit in Alaska. Trump suggests flexibility from Zelensky for potential peace talks with Russia.</s>
